extendedInfo.description: This is an early release of a free Holo themed split keyboard. It currently only supports 1280x800 screens (Xoom, Iconia Tab, etc).A not on permissions:This app requests android.permission.READ_CONTACTS (Personal Information) so contacts can be used in suggestions. It also  uses your user dictionary for suggestions which falls under personal information permissions.Notable Features* Selectable Themes (Holographic, Gingerbread, Stone)* Multiple keyboard modes (split, full, and one handed)* 100% customizable key and key label color combinations. See the "Colorize" options in Theme Settings on the keyboard preference page.Keyboard Selection Gestures:* Swipe right or left to toggle keyboards swipes must be pretty large (avoids accidental keyboard changes)

reviews.title: Great replacement to the stock keyboard
reviews.comment: It works great with everything that I use a keyboard for. It\'s come a long ways from the earlier releases... Keep up the great work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Safe to Install
reviews.comment: Every keyboard you will find on the marketplace needs these permissions. Android systems display the safety warning because of the nature of the download but AS LONG AS THE PROGRAM DOESN\'T HAVE NETWORK PERMISSIONS THEY CANNOT COLLECT YOUR INFO. Do your research, people, before giving low ratings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not for me yet
reviews.comment: Keys are small in portrait on my hires 7\" tablet due to useless keys (like .com, [, ]) on sides. Other keyboards locate them better. Needs lot work. But its good its free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus 7
reviews.comment: It is not made for Nexus 7\" screen at all! Looks good only on really big screens.
reviews.author: Igor Vujacic

reviews.title: Access to personal info?
reviews.comment: I\'m sure the keyboard itself is great, but I didn\'t get past the \"this app may collect personal information such as credit card info and passwords\" message when I was about to set as default keyboard. Where is this data stored? :/
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Just installed it, and it looks amazing!! Think I just found my new keyboard!! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Aspect ratio error
reviews.comment: Does not fit to screen width on few tabs

reviews.title: Word predictions needed
reviews.comment: I like the keyboard layout though it is a bit small for my galaxy note but it really require some word predictions as I need to type fast But I will keep support your work P. S. The portrait layout of the keyboard shown on my phone /tablet was only half please fix

reviews.title: I don\'t see it
reviews.comment: galaxy note has resolution of 1280x800 but i can\'t use it. if it\'s for tablets only, please make it available only for tablets. but i hope its not, so I will wait for fix. It doesn\'t apear even under \'input method\' menu.  for those who is concerned about safety -  I think its safe to use untill it wont require internet access. make it work on gtn7000 and i will give ir 5 stars.
